amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 118-298 to strike and replace the bill language with an amendment in the nature of a substitute.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike and replace the bill language with an amendment in the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 213 (Roll no. 700).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 213 (Roll no. 700).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
